summary: Project to proceed with targeted visible fixes only: PWA behavior, mandatory modal, and page layout adjustments; avoid a full rebuild.
architectural_notes: Avoid full rebuild; proceed with targeted fixes only (PWA, mandatory modal, page layout).

existing_features.title: Fix PWA behavior so the app is clearly installable as a real standalone PWA (not just a shortcut) by ensuring the service worker is registered at runtime, becomes the controlling service worker for the page, and the install CTA reliably triggers the captured `beforeinstallprompt` flow when available.

Make the consent gate modal strictly non-dismissible until the user accepts all required consents (cookies + terms + privacy), including preventing dismissal via ESC, outside click, and any other dialog-close interactions; acceptance must remain persisted via the existing localStorage consent state.

Adjust page layout styling (targeted UI/layout corrections only) to improve spacing rhythm, visual hierarchy, and readability across the main pages (Home, Mission, How It Works, Terms, Privacy) without rewriting or changing the existing content.

new_feature_requests.summary: Apply visible PWA behavior fixes (targeted, user-facing) without full rebuild
Make the modal mandatory (cannot be skipped/dismissed until action/acknowledgement)
Adjust/fix the layout of the pages (targeted UI/layout corrections)
